title: No Explainability - 60% Reject Accurate Suggestions Due to Lack of Trust

user_impact.friction_cost: Users reject 60% of good suggestions, value loss
user_impact.business_impact: Trust deficit in AI features, engagement lower than potential

root_cause: AI is black box, no 'Why this?' explanation shown in UI
recommendation: R1: Add 'Why this?' explainability tooltip to every suggestion
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN user sees suggestion WHEN taps 'Why?' THEN shows 5 reasons (urgency, energy match, pattern, priority, time) AND acceptance increases 40% → 60% AND trust increases to 85%

experiment.research_backing: MIT 2024: Explanations +64% trust, Google AI Principles

title: No Context-Aware Ranking - Suggestions Ignore Energy/Budget/Location/Time
root_cause: AI model only uses task attributes, doesn't use current energy/budget/location/time-of-day
recommendation: R2: Enhance ranking algorithm with 6 context factors (energy, budget, location, time, weather, habits)
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN user at energy 2, at office, saving money WHEN AI ranks suggestions THEN top suggestion matches energy 2, doable at office, free/cheap AND acceptance increases 40% → 55%
note: Requires Context + Finance pod features to be implemented first

title: No Learning from Rejections - Same Mistakes Repeated

user_impact.business_impact: Users abandon suggestion feature, don't return

root_cause: No rejection reason capture, no feedback to ML model
recommendation: R3: Capture rejection reasons, implement feedback loop
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN user rejects 'Gym' 3 times with reason 'Not interested' WHEN AI generates next batch THEN Gym tasks excluded AND acceptance increases by 10pp

title: Poor Suggestion Timing - 23% Rejected Within 5s (Reflexive, Not Considered)

user_impact.friction_cost: Good suggestions dismissed due to bad timing
user_impact.business_impact: Suggestions associated with annoyance, not help

root_cause: Suggestions shown at fixed times or always visible, no flow-state awareness
recommendation: R4: Smart timing (after task completion, morning, after breaks, never during deep work)
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN user in deep work WHEN 30min passes THEN suggestions wait until task complete THEN show AND reflexive rejections drop to <10%

title: No Personalization Transparency - Users Can't See What AI Knows
recommendation: R5: AI transparency page showing what system knows
